articles.description: The Terriers made eight changes to their starting lineup but a late disallowed goal for Barnsley was the real only threat to the lead Duane Holmes gave them in the first half
articles.content: Expectations were on the Terriers to claim untroubled passage through to the FA Cup fifth round at the John Smiths Stadium, and an unfussy performance by a much-changed side saw them do exactly that.… [+3343 chars]

articles.author: James Hunter
articles.title: 4s and 5s in the player ratings as Sunderland produce another dire performance against Doncaster - Chronicle Live
articles.description: Sunderland lost at home to basement side Doncaster to slip further off the promotion pace
articles.content:
Managerless Sunderland crashed to a damaging home defeat at the hands of bottom-of-the-table Doncaster Rovers.
The Black Cats, who sacked head coach Lee Johnson last weekend following a 6-0 reverse … [+1927 chars]

articles.author: Isabel Baldwin
articles.title: Crystal Palace's FA Cup tie with Hartlepool is paused due to a medical emergency - Daily Mail
articles.description: Both club's doctors have reportedly rushed over the pitch and into the stands to attend to the incident. The players have been taken to the side of the pitch with play paused.
articles.content:
Crystal Palace's FA Cup tie with Hartlepool was halted in the second half due to an apparent medical emergency in the away end. 
The game was brought to a halt in the 53rd minute, with the score 2-0… [+1208 chars]
